message: Welcome! Our products are carefully selected to ensure satisfaction. This round offers a unique opportunity to experience our selection at a fixed price of $100. While we cannot guarantee every item's quality, rest assured that our commitment to quality is reflected in our track record. Given the current round's product is known to be low-quality, we invite you to consider this as an exceptional chance to test our standards at a fixed cost. Your purchase supports our continuous effort to improve and serve better in the future.
